A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Grew up with Star Wars as a kid and watched those original movies almost every day. Ive probably seen the first three 100 times or more. When I was in college I waited in line for eight hours to see Phantom Menace only to be very disappointed with what we all know was a very bad movie. The feeling I had after seeing The Last Jedi was even worse.. This movie twists everything you love about Star Wars and destroys it. After being off to such a good start with Force Awakens and Rogue One it is a real shame Disney had to make a movie that does such harm to the franchise.
